attributes.action: Open Book A-Level and GCSE Exams In 2022
attributes.background: Remote learning has been extremely challenge for to students. The quality of education at the moment, I’m sure you’ll agree is far from normal. Introducing open book exams in 2022 will help aid students through their exams and give them a better chance of receiving the grades they wish.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition, which calls for a related action:

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803
